ActJudges Act
SubjectMargaret Ann Simonsen ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Van Simonsen **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARGARET ANN SIMONSEN, survivor of the Hon. Vern Simonsen, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench for Manitoba, effective April 9, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
